name: 战球英雄
description:
This is a multiplayer game that combines football and action games. The core of the game draws on the essence of football and action games, while also creating some very interesting rules. Let the player play more exciting!

The basic rule of the game is simple: to get the ball into the other side's goal, no matter how or how you use it or the strategy. The other side to grab the ball or you go to grab the ball, OK, you don't need to be polite, wave your fist or hand weapon, give the opponent a color look.

However, you need to be extra careful with the powerful monsters on the pitch, as they can kill you at any time.

You can be a master manipulation, or a resourceful commander, or something else interesting.

Roles can use task rewards to upgrade equipment and skills.

There are single-player mode and multiplayer mode, multiplayer mode after completing the simple difficulty level 3. Multiplayer mode currently includes 1V1, 2V2, 3V3, 5V5, and even a 10V10 map will be added to the back

This version has 12 levels, many monsters, currently only one character is available, followed by new levels, roles and monsters.
